'''Elvet-isle''' was an island in the [[Withywindle]] in the [[Old Forest]]. The isle was inhabited by [[swans]].<ref>{{AB|2}}</ref> 
==Etymology==
''Elvet'' is an old word meaning "swan" from the [[Old English]] ''elfetu'' or ''ilfetu''.<ref>{{webcite|website=[https://lalaithmesp.blogspot.com/ Lalaith's Middle-earth Science Pages]|articleurl=https://lalaithmesp.blogspot.com/p/bombadil-in-shire.html|articlename=Bombadil in the Shire : Elvet-isle in the Withywindle|accessed=24 February 2020}}; {{webcite|website=[http://www.bosworthtoller.com/ Bosworth-Toller Anglo-Saxon Dictionary]|articleurl=http://www.bosworthtoller.com/020481|articlename=ilfette|accessed=24 February 2020}}</ref>
{{references}}
